features.name: Twitter Connector Registration
features.description: Twitter connector registers itself as a social connector with defined name, display name, and icon.
test_scenarios: Verify Twitter connector appears in available connections list
Verify connector is marked as an Engage Connector

features.name: Twitter API Configuration
features.description: Configure and save Twitter API credentials (API key and API secret) for social integration.
test_scenarios: Enter valid API key and API secret
Verify settings are encrypted in database
Verify error message for wrong credentials

features.name: Twitter Social Sharing
features.description: Share content items to Twitter with automatic URL shortening and activity tracking.
features.ui_location: Content pages with social share widgets
test_scenarios: Click Twitter share button on content
Verify Twitter intent window opens with correct URL
Verify user scoring points are awarded for Twitter share
Test URL transformation for shared links
Verify analytics tracking for shared content
Test sharing without being logged in

features.name: Twitter Connector Settings Upgrade
features.description: Upgrade Twitter connector configuration from older versions, migrating 'AppId' to 'API key' and 'AppSecret' to 'API secret'.
test_scenarios: Verify old 'AppId' setting migrates to 'API key'
Verify old 'AppSecret' setting migrates to 'API secret'

features.name: Twitter Connection Validation
features.description: Validate Twitter API credentials before saving connection settings.
test_scenarios: Validate correct API key and secret combination
Show error for invalid API key
Show error for invalid API secret
Show specific error message for wrong credentials
Verify validation before saving to database

features.name: Twitter Connector Installation
features.description: Install Twitter connector module package with all required components and resources.
test_scenarios: Verify icon files are in correct location

features.name: Twitter Share UI Component
features.description: Client-side JavaScript component for Twitter sharing functionality with popup window.
features.ui_location: Any page with social sharing enabled
test_scenarios: Verify Twitter share button displays with icon
Click Twitter share button opens popup window
Verify URL encoding in share intent
Verify MyStatus points refresh after share
